name: NSAccessibilityElement
desc: The basic infrastructure necessary for interacting with an assistive app.

items.name: class func element(withRole: NSAccessibility.Role, frame: NSRect, label: String?, parent: Any?) -> Any
items.desc: Instantiates and configures a new accessibility element.

items.name: func accessibilityAddChildElement(NSAccessibilityElement)
items.desc: Adds a child to the accessibility element in the accessibility hierarchy.

items.name: func accessibilityFrameInParentSpace() -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the accessibility element’s frame in its parent’s coordinate system.

items.name: func setAccessibilityFrameInParentSpace(NSRect)
items.desc: Sets the accessibility element’s frame in its parent’s coordinate system.
